div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2365 Bourg, 60 km. NE of Lyon, 1811 Burial: 3rd-2nd cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 1000+ AR Massalia: ob. Disposition: unknown Journal d'agriculture, lettres et arts du départment de l'Ain, 1844, pp. 156-7; 1846, p. 137 Blanchet, Traité, p. 539, nos. 1, 2, 3, (probably all one hd.)
